name: Realistic Goat Racing
description:
Realistic Goat Racing

Requires 4 gamepads!

Players play on two teams, one for each goat. P1 + P2 control the Trooper, P3 + P4 control the Farmer.

Race to the finish line in the most cutting-edge caprine racing simulation available.

CONTROLS

Players 1 + 3:

  • Sticks: aim left and right guns
  • Triggers: fire left and right guns

Players 2 + 4:

  • Left Stick: Move
  • A button: Jump
